analysis.key_quote: It is untenable to support a workforce that could be completely replaced by the fiat of a lazy despot who simply wants yes men, when there is work to be done in this country which needs talent and dedication, not lap dog slop.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the idea of a workforce being easily replaced by a leader seeking compliance over merit, indicating concerns about politicization and the integrity of the civil service.
